rules_text:
Exile any number of nonland permanents you control. Return them to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.
Reconstruct {7}{U} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for its reconstruct cost reduced by the mana value of a permanent you sacrifice as you cast it this way. Then exile this.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Nothing left but stars sinking into dreams.[/i]
